title: Plastic Waste Management
text: The main objective of this focus area is to promote the effective management of exisiting plastic waste. The project will work with private waste enterprises to enhance their capacity for plastic waste collection, processing, and recycling. This will further help to prevent plastic waste leakage into the environment and divert them into the product value chain.
output: • Strengthened capacities of waste enterprises and workers, including women, in plastic waste management

title: Innovation around non-plastic packaging, and promotion of green enterprises
text: The goal of this focus area is to create opportunities for business and enterprises to develop and promote plastic alternative products including packaging to promote the transition to circular economy. This will further help in reducing plastic consumption, lowering plastic waste generation.
output: • Increased capacities of green enterprises on sustainable plastic alternative solutions
activities:
• Sustainable Packaging Program
  • Green Business Accelerator Program

title: Supporting advocacy, data and policy changes
text: The goal of this focus area is to engage key stakeholders in developing inclusive and evidence-based policies and support youths and school children in awareness and advocacy.
output:
• Strengthened alliance of Waste Workers (WWs) on policy making process
  • Improved capacities of public institutions, civil society and youth in policy formulation on Solid Waste Management (SWM) and recycling at the local, provincial and federal levels
  • Enhanced knowledge and capacities of youth in Circular Economy (CE) and data driven advocacy for CE
activities:
• Waste Smart Fellowship
  • Climate Smart Schools
  • Youth Advocacy Grant
  • CSOs of Waste Workers
  • Provincial and Local Level Solid Waste Management Policy Guidelines Development
  • National Solid Waste Management (SWM) Recycling Policy
